co.cask.cdap.api.flow

Interface Flow

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Processor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFlow

    public interface Flow
extends Processor
    Flow is a collection of Flowlets that are wired together into a Direct Acylic Graph (DAG).

    Implement this interface to create a flow. The configure() method will be invoked during deployment time and it returns a FlowSpecification to specify how to configure the flow.

    See the Cask DAP Developer Guide and the CDAP instance example applications.
    See Also:
    FlowSpecification, Flowlet

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FlowSpecification configure()
      Deprecated. 
      Use AbstractFlow.configureFlow() instead

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        @Deprecated
FlowSpecification configure()
        Deprecated. Use AbstractFlow.configureFlow() instead
        Configure the Flow by returning a FlowSpecification.
        Returns:
        An instance of FlowSpecification
